description:
We are seeking a highly skilled System Integration Expert/Integration Architect to join our team. The ideal candidate will have expertise in system integrations, API development, and strong experience with ALTOVA tools. You will be responsible for designing and implementing scalable integration solutions, defining architectural considerations, and ensuring seamless communication between various systems. This role requires proficiency in .NET, C#, and a deep understanding of integration patterns and testing methodologies.

Key Responsibilities:

- Design and Architect Integration Solutions:
- Collaborate with stakeholders to understand system requirements and translate them into robust integration architectures.
- Define integration strategies, including API development and data mapping, to ensure seamless communication between systems.
- Utilize ALTOVA Tools:
- Leverage expertise in ALTOVA MapForce and ALTOVA XMLSpy to design, develop, and manage data transformations and integration flows.
- Perform data mapping and schema validations using - ALTOVA for efficient system integrations.
- API Development & Management:
Develop, implement, and maintain APIs using .NET and C# for system-to-system communication.
Experience in front end development with ANGULAR will be a huge plus.
Define and document API requirements, ensuring adherence to best practices for scalability and security.
Integration Requirements & Testing:
Gather and document integration requirements from various stakeholders.
Define and execute integration test plans, ensuring that all systems communicate effectively and function as expected.
Perform unit testing, integration testing, and performance testing to ensure the robustness of integration solutions.
Architectural Considerations:
Provide guidance on architectural design patterns and ensure solutions are scalable, secure, and maintainable.
Evaluate integration architectures for long-term viability, scalability, and performance optimization.
Collaboration & Leadership:
Work closely with development teams, product managers, and external vendors to ensure timely and successful system integrations.
Offer technical leadership and mentorship on integration practices and architecture.
Troubleshooting and Optimization:
Troubleshoot integration-related issues and optimize existing integrations for better performance and efficiency.
Provide ongoing support and refinement of integration processes as new system updates and features are introduced.
Must have experience in development (Front end and Backend)
Key Qualifications:
Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
Proven experience in system integration, API development, and working with ALTOVA tools (MapForce, XMLSpy, etc.).
Proficiency in .NET, C# and solid understanding of REST/SOAP API design.
Experience in designing scalable integration architectures and defining integration patterns.
Strong knowledge of data mapping, ETL, and data transformation processes.
Expertise in testing methodologies (unit testing, integration testing, etc.) and quality assurance practices.
Understanding of security and scalability considerations in system integration projects.
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Strong communication skills with the ability to work collaboratively across multiple teams and stakeholders.
Preferred Skills:
Experience with cloud-based integrations (Azure, AWS) is a plus.
Familiarity with message queues (e.g., RabbitMQ, Kafka) and microservices architecture.
Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices for integration deployment.
Integration with ALTOVA
Knowledge of .NET Core & C# is must
NOTE - THIS IS AN IMMEDIATE OPENING AND EXPECTED JOIN URGENTLY
